title: Крутая перемена
overview: Is it possible to be a good teacher if you failed the school of life? Contrary to family tradition, Andrei did not become a teacher, but left to conquer Moscow. The business went bankrupt, there was nothing to pay the debts. Only the sale of the family house, where Pushkin himself lived, will help. That's just for the deal you need the permission of the offended father, who ended up behind bars. To regain his trust, Andrey goes to teach at two schools - a regular one and an evening one at the colony. And he is no longer sure which one is safer ...
